solution_line_template: The remainder of Sabina's tuition bill comes to ${total_tuition_cost} - ${saved_amount} = $<<{total_tuition_cost}-{saved_amount}={remainder_tuition}>>{remainder_tuition}.
The grant will cover ${remainder_tuition} * {grant_coverage_percent} = $<<{remainder_tuition}*{grant_coverage_percent}={grant_amount}>>{grant_amount} of her tuition.
That means that Sabina will need to apply for a loan of ${remainder_tuition} - ${grant_amount} = $<<{remainder_tuition}-{grant_amount}={loan_needed}>>{loan_needed} to pay for the rest of her tuition.
